reviews.author: Kiryl Shutsemau (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Kiryl Shutsemau approved the patch, but suggested adding a check for compound_info_has_mask() in page_zonenum().

reviews.author: Muchun Song
reviews.summary: Muchun Song reviewed the series and provided Reviewed-by tags for several patches, indicating they have reviewed the code but did not raise any specific technical concerns.

reviews.author: David (arm)
reviews.summary: David (arm) reviewed the patch series and raised concerns about potential functional changes in HVO, specifically regarding folios crossing zones during boot.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: Reviewer Usama Arif raised concerns about the patch's applicability to ARM architecture, pointing out a potential issue with undefined behavior when calculating order for certain huge page sizes.

reviews.author: Vlastimil Babka
reviews.summary: Vlastimil Babka expressed concerns about the patch's approach to shared tail pages, specifically suggesting that they should be per node+zone instead of just per node.

reviews.author: Matthew Wilcox
reviews.summary: Matthew Wilcox questioned why the patch returns the zone number of the head page, suggesting it might not be relevant to the caller's needs.

reviews.author: Kiryl Shutsemau (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Kiryl Shutsemau raised no specific technical concerns or objections in the provided messages, but rather engaged in a discussion about moving compound_info_has_mask() check to per-zone.

reviews.author: Muchun Song
reviews.summary: Muchun Song reviewed patches 11 and 16, providing Reviewed-by tags for both without raising any technical concerns.

reviews.author: David (arm)
reviews.summary: David (arm) raised concerns about the HugeTLB vmemmap optimization, specifically questioning whether HVO should be possible for certain page sizes and suggesting that metadata must span at least two pages.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: Reviewer Usama Arif raised concerns about the patch not working for ARM due to undefined behavior in ilog2 calculation, and suggested using order = ilog2(len / sizeof(struct page)) instead.

reviews.author: Vlastimil Babka
reviews.summary: Vlastimil Babka expressed concerns about the patch series, specifically mentioning that he is 'not thrilled' by the change in page_zonenum() to use the head page and suggested allowing shared tail pages per node+zone instead of just per node.

reviews.author: Matthew Wilcox
reviews.summary: Matthew Wilcox questioned the correctness of returning the zone number of the head page instead of the current page's zone number, suggesting it would be good to discuss this in the commit message.

reviews.author: Kiryl Shutsemau (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Kiryl Shutsemau raised no specific technical concerns or objections to the patch, but instead responded to other reviewers' comments on patches in the series.

reviews.author: Muchun Song
reviews.summary: Muchun Song reviewed patches 9, 11, and 17 of the series, providing Reviewed-by tags for all three patches without raising any specific technical concerns or objections.

reviews.author: David (arm)
reviews.summary: David (arm) raised concerns about the HugeTLB vmemmap optimization, specifically questioning whether HVO should be possible for certain page sizes and suggesting that metadata must span at least two pages.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: Reviewer Usama Arif raised concerns about the patch's applicability to ARM architecture, specifically pointing out an undefined behavior in ilog2 calculation for a certain hugetlb size on arm64.

reviews.author: Vlastimil Babka
reviews.summary: Vlastimil Babka raised concerns about the patch to update vmemmap_dedup.rst, specifically questioning the approach of using shared tail pages per node instead of per node+zone.

reviews.author: Matthew Wilcox
reviews.summary: Matthew Wilcox questioned the correctness of returning the zone number of the head page instead of the current page, suggesting it might not matter and requesting clarification in the commit message.

reviews.author: Kiryl Shutsemau (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Kiryl Shutsemau requested changes to patch [PATCHv6 08/17] mm: Make page_zonenum() use head page, specifically adding a compound_info_has_mask() check and moving the function to per-zone.
